Hi Kent,

Maybe you could provide it as jar file on
http://sourceforge.net/=
projects/junit/ ? 
There are already other 4.5 snapshots out there and it w=
ould relieve
me and other runner providers from going through the svn check=
out &
package hassle.

Thanks,
Johannes

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Ken=
t Beck" <kentb@...> wrote:
>
> All,
> 
> Following our discussions last wee=
k, we have incorporated the old
> JUnit4ClassRunner into 4.5. (The new runn=
er is called
BlockJUnit4ClassRunner
> because it is organized as a "block" =
of "statements" instead of nested
> procedures). Those of you who have writ=
ten custom runners, we'd
appreciate
> it if you could try out the release c=
andidate to make sure it
supports your
> existing runners.
> 
> Next up, re=
lease notes and then out the door!
> 
> Whew!
> 
> Kent Beck
> Three Rivers=
 Institute
